00003 package Value::String;
00004 my $pkg = 'Value::String';
00005 
00006 use strict; no strict "refs";
00007 our @ISA = qw(Value);
00008 
00009 #
00010 #  Create a string object
00011 #
00012 sub new {
00013   my $self = shift; my $class = ref($self) || $self;
00014   my $context = (Value::isContext($_[0]) ? shift : $self->context);
00015   my $x = join('',@_);
00016   my $s = bless {data => [$x], context => $context}, $class;
00017   if ($Parser::installed && !($x eq '' && $self->getFlag('allowEmptyStrings'))) {
00018     my $strings = $context->{strings};
00019     if (!$strings->{$x}) {
00020       my $X = $strings->{uc($x)};
00021       Value::Error("String constant '%s' is not defined in this context",$x)
00022         unless $X && !$X->{caseSensitive};
00023       $x = uc($x); while ($strings->{$x}{alias}) {$x = $strings->{$x}{alias}}
00024     }
00025     $s->{caseSensitive} = 1 if $strings->{$x}{caseSensitive};
00026   }
00027   return $s;
00028 }

00030 #
00031 #  Return the appropriate data.
00032 #
00033 sub length {1}
00034 sub typeRef {$Value::Type{string}}
00035 sub value {shift->{data}[0]}
00036 
00037 sub isOne {0}
00038 sub isZero {0}

00040 sub transferFlags {}

00043 
00044 #
00045 #  Convert to a string object
00046 #
00047 sub promote {
00048   my $self = shift;
00049   my $context = (Value::isContext($_[0]) ? shift : $self->context);
00050   my $x = (scalar(@_) ? shift : $self); $x = [$x,@_] if scalar(@_) > 0;
00051   $x = Value::makeValue($x,showError=>1,context=>$context);
00052   $x = join('',@{$x}) if ref($x) eq 'ARRAY';
00053   $x = $self->make($context,$x) unless Value::isValue($x);
00054   return $x;
00055 }
00056 
00057 ############################################
00058 #
00059 #  Operations on strings
00060 #
00061 sub compare {
00062   my ($self,$l,$r) = Value::checkOpOrderWithPromote(@_);
00063   return $l->value cmp $r->value if $l->{caseSensitive} || $r->{caseSensitive};
00064   return uc($l->value) cmp uc($r->value);
00065 }
